title: Inflows Into Digital Asset Investment Products Cross the $1 Billion Mark — Study
description: The U.S. dollar value of funds flowing into digital asset investment products or exchange-traded products (ETP) in 2023 now exceeds $1 billion. In the week ending Nov. 10, approximately $293 million flowed into ETPs. Bitcoin ETP trading volumes in the week under review constituted nearly 20% of total bitcoin trading volumes on so-called trusted exchanges. […]

title: Kazakhstan to Harness Artificial Intelligence in the Fight Against Illicit Asset Transfers
description: Kazakhstan is taking significant steps to combat illegal asset transfers abroad and uncover fraudulent financial schemes, as revealed by Prosecutor General Berik Asylov during a recent meeting with President Kassym-Joomart Tokayev. The country is set to leverage cutting-edge IT technologies and artificial intelligence (AI) in its pursuit of justice and accountability. Utilizing AI to detect ... Read more

title: IOTA Takes Center Stage: BUILD.5’s Game-Changing Project API and Innovations in Billion-Dollar Market
description: BUILD.5 is advancing towards becoming a comprehensive web3 platform, simplifying interactions with DLTs like IOTA and Shimmer. New features include Project API, full integration of @iota/sdk, Auction API, and Stamp API. In the latest development update for November 2023, BUILD.5 is making significant strides in its journey to transform into a comprehensive web3 platform, streamlining [...]
